steps.title: Melt the butter in a pan.
steps.content: Melt the butter in a pan.

steps.title: Cook the mushrooms, shallot, and garlic in the butter until they are soft.
steps.content: Cook the mushrooms, shallot, and garlic in the butter until they are soft.

steps.title: Beat eggs with thyme, salt, and pepper.
steps.content: Beat eggs with thyme, salt, and pepper.

steps.title: Pour the egg mix on the mushrooms.
steps.content: Pour the egg mix on the mushrooms.

steps.title: Cook on medium until it sets.
steps.content: Cook on medium until it sets.

steps.title: Slide the pan under a broiler the brown.
steps.content: Slide the pan under a broiler the brown.
